title: I'm having 500 ping-10,000 ping, exclusively in Ranked games, normals are steady 60
body: Is anyone else having this issue? I tested to confirm this but it sucks when I test ranked and lag after 4 successful normal games because then I get leaverbuster, possible bans, and teammates threatening to hunt down my address and rape me with a cactus. (actual quote).

replies.body:
Wow! I hope you reported the player that threatened you with those words since that was definitely not okay for them to say. :/

As for your high ping (latency) in matches, this is something we should be able to troubleshoot and fix together. These sorts of issues are sometimes caused by incompatible network settings, but can also be caused by issues along your network route. The first step is to ensure your local network settings have been [**properly configured for League**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

If you run into further issues after taking those steps, let me know.
